record.label: set.expiration
record.comments: when the expiration.time is not null OR current.status = inactive OR suspended without breached, we will not set the expiration.time

statements.statements: if (null(expiration.time in $L.sloresponse) and not ((current.status in $L.sloresponse=5 or not (breached in $L.sloresponse) and suspended in $L.sloresponse))) then if ($L.lastintervalissuspend and not (null($L.expiration.date))) then (expiration.time in $L.sloresponse=jscall("UTCDate.calcDate", $L.expiration.date, $L.suspended.interval, $L.time.zone, $L.calendar, $L.holiday)) else (expiration.time in $L.sloresponse=$L.expiration.date)

if (not (null(expiration.time in $L.sloresponse)) and expiration.time in $L.sloresponse>$L.tod and current.status in $L.sloresponse=2) then if (nullsub(suspended in $L.sloresponse, false)=false) then if (agreement.category in $L.sloresponse="sla") then (next.breach in $L.active=min(expiration.time in $L.sloresponse, nullsub(next.breach in $L.active, expiration.time in $L.sloresponse));if (next.breach in $L.active=expiration.time in $L.sloresponse) then ($L.next.sla.start=start.time in $L.sloresponse;$L.next.sla.time.zone=$L.time.zone;$L.next.sla.calendar=$L.calendar;$L.next.sla.holiday=$L.holiday;if (lng($L.start)>0 and 1 in $L.start>$L.next.sla.start) then ($L.next.sla.start=1 in $L.start);$L.next.sla.start.list=$L.start;$L.next.sla.end.list=$L.end)) else ($L.next.ola.breach=min(expiration.time in $L.sloresponse, nullsub($L.next.ola.breach, expiration.time in $L.sloresponse));if ($L.next.ola.breach=expiration.time in $L.sloresponse) then ($L.next.ola.start=start.time in $L.sloresponse;$L.next.ola.time.zone=$L.time.zone;$L.next.ola.calendar=$L.calendar;$L.next.ola.holiday=$L.holiday;if (lng($L.start)>0 and 1 in $L.start>$L.next.ola.start) then ($L.next.ola.start=1 in $L.start);$L.next.ola.start.list=$L.start;$L.next.ola.end.list=$L.end))
for $L.x = 1 to lng(denull(alert.names in $L.slo)) do (if (index($L.x in alert.names in $L.slo, $L.alert.names)=0) then ($L.alert.names=$L.alert.names+{$L.x in alert.names in $L.slo}))

$L.values={$L.expiration.date, name in $L.slo, slo.id in $L.slo, nullsub(condition in $L.slo, true), active in $L.active, $L.calendar, $L.time.zone, $L.allowed.time, $L.holiday, agreement.id in $L.slo}
